title: How to tell if my laptop has got 2 or 4 cores - Quora

response.answer_text: How can I tell if my laptop has got 2 or 4 cores? That depends on its operating system, which you didn’t tell us. I only know about Windows 10. You can find that right in the Task Manager. Just right click the Task Bar and select “Task Manager”. In the Task Manager, click the “More Details” button and go to the Performance tab. Click the CPU tab, and it will tell you your processor information right there.  Inside that red oval.

You can check in device manager (if you’re on windows) and under processors, you can see the amount of logical cores your processor has. Another way to find out is by using user benchmark to test your PC and your components. This will also tell you what processor you have and what speed it is and how many cores it has. Lastly, you can go to control panel, then system and security, then system, and it will tell you the processor you have. Search it online to find the specifications of your processor. I hope this helps.

To determine if your laptop has 2 or more cores then use CPU-Z, it provides information about your computer parts especially how many cores your CPU has. It also provides other information regarding to your CPU such as core speed, and also determine the other capabilities of your computer parts such as the motherboard, graphic card, etc…
